DOC.brief_summary: Investigators hypothesized that perioperative lung ultrasound would be beneficial in pediatric patients undergoing cardiac surgery compared to those who did not receive lung ultrasound.
DOC.brief_title: Intraoperative Lung Ultrasound in Pediatric Patients
DOC.criteria: Acyanotic congenital heart disease patients undergoing cardiac surgery under general anesthesia History of surgery on the lungs Cyanotic congenital heart disease Abnormal preoperative chest radiograph findings including atelectasis, pneumothorax, pleural effusion, and pneumonia Considered inappropriate by the investigator
